text: James Reginald Cook (born 1904) was an English professional footballer who played as a wing half. ==References== Category:1904 births Category:Sportspeople from Sunderland, Tyne and Wear Category:Footballers from Tyne and Wear Category:English footballers Category:Association football wing halves Category:Chester-le-Street Town F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:West Stanley F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Date of death missing Category:Year of death missing
title: Jim Cook (footballer, born 1904)
